channel.title: Authors on Shirley Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Shirley Wang

item.description: I am a third-year graduate student in the clinical science program at Harvard University, working with Matt Nock. My research examines why people engage in behaviors that are harmful to themselves, including eating disorder behaviors, nonsuicidal self-injury, and suicide. I use a wide range of methodologies to study these problems, including laboratory-based behavioral experiments, real-time monitoring, and large-scale longitudinal studies.
